restic 0.3.3 released, Debian package

08 Jan 2017

Weâ€™ve released another minor version: restic 0.3.3. As always, thanks for reporting any issues you encounter!

Recently, several people worked together to create and upload an official Debian package for restic. A few days ago on 2 January 2017, that package entered the testing distribution, so restic will be part of the next Debian stable release!
